about_the_game:
~~A sci-fi short story about overcoming problems and changing perspectives~~



Stellar Reflections is a short story visual novel set in a dystopian future, within a sprawling space station. In this bleak era, personal freedoms have been suppressed, and life choices are dictated by the all-powerful regime. Delve into the narrative through the eyes of the protagonist, Aurelia, a nobody spending her days at her junkyard job, in a bar, or holed up in her cabin. She'll come to face a life-altering decision that will challenge her perception of the world.




In the distant future, Earth and Mars are used exclusively as mining facilities, and most of human population resides in space stations around the planets and the Moon. The world is governed by a centralized, autocratic government managing most of life choices for every existing human.
The government just made a decision directly affecting the life, of the protagonist - Aurelia. And she's far from being a fan. How will she handle it?


Length
Stellar Reflections is a short story, consisting of about 17000 words, divided into 15 bits. Reaching all endings takes about 1h and 20 minutes.

Audio
There are 16 original tracks created specifically for this novel.

Endings
The novel features a couple of choices which lead to one of three possible endings: bad, neutral, or good.

content_descriptors.notes: The novel does not present depictions of any risqué content, however readers may find certain sound effects disturbing, and the story contains potentially controversial subjects, such as alcohol abuse, drug abuse, sexual references, self-harm references, rape references, other crime references, as well as strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Aurelia is a nobody living out her life on a space station orbiting Earth, spending her days working in a junkyard, frequenting a bar, or retreating to her cabin. She will confront a life-altering decision that challenges her perception of the world. Can she change and grow, or is she too far gone?
